page.title: 02FARMING
page.content:
{LITTLE DEAN HEAD} On our farm we keep cattle we have 20 bulls and about 11 cows. We keep them for meat we get our cows off Mr. B. Fox. We keep our cattle in a barn, there is room for about 15-20 cows. We are building 2 more barns for cows in the winter. We feed our cows with hay, silage and corn.
{DEAN HEAD FARM} Dean Head Farm can be traced back to 1379, when Joan of Dene was living there. It is notable because the barn and the old part of the farmhouse are of{Cruck Frame}construction and are believed to be 600 years old. The timbers of the house are believed to be old ship timbers. The "new" part of the farmhouse was added 400 years ago.
(cont.)
